Thunder Hammer.name: Thunder Hammer
Thunder Hammer.flavor: You slam your weapon into the ground, and the earth itself transmits your god’s wrath, bludgeoning your enemies with the force of thunder and either knocking them to the ground or driving them back.
Thunder Hammer.onHit: 2[W] + Wisdom modifier thunder damage, and you either knock the target prone or push it 2 squares.
Thunder Hammer.weapon: If you are wielding a hammer, the number of squares you can push the target equals 1 + your Intelligence modifier.

Resolve of Steel.name: Resolve of Steel
Resolve of Steel.flavor: Like steel forged and tempered by a master smith, you resist the worst of your enemies’ attacks.
Resolve of Steel.effect: You gain resist 10 to all damage until the end of your next turn.

Hammer of the Final Pronouncement.name: Hammer of the Final Pronouncement
Hammer of the Final Pronouncement.flavor: Your god’s judgment drives your foe back and roots it to the ground.
Hammer of the Final Pronouncement.onHit: 4[W] + Wisdom modifier damage. You push the target 3 squares, and it is immobilized (save ends).
Hammer of the Final Pronouncement.onMiss: Half damage. You push the target 3 squares, and it is immobilized until the end of your next turn.
Hammer of the Final Pronouncement.weapon: If you are wielding a hammer, the number of squares you can push the target equals 3 + your Intelligence modifier.
